name: Learn: Months and Seasons
description:
With Learn: Months and Seasons your kid will be able to learn the months and the seasons. 

Includes two modes:

1. Learn

  • Touch the seasons and months to hear the pronunciation
  • Spelling for seasons and months are also shown

2. Challenge

  • Different challenge type. (Can be configured in settings)
  • Your kid will have to select the correct answer out of three options.
  • Challenge types:
  1. Match - Match the month/season with the corresponding image.
  2. Sequence - Select the month/season that goes before, after, or in-between.
  3. In Group - Select the month/season that corresponds to the displayed season/month.
  • Months to match can be configured in settings

Different languages available. (Can be configured in settings)

Let us know about other learning activities you would like to add!!
